channel.title: Melbourne on Max's Life in Australia
channel.description: Recent content in Melbourne on Max's Life in Australia

item.title: A Late-Night Hostel Talk: Confidence, Culture, and the Journey
item.description:
It was late at night in yha hostel in Melbourne. Earlier, a group of us had been chatting around the bar table, sharing travel stories and laughing. Slowly, people drifted off to their rooms, until it was just me and a German guy still talking. The room grew quieter, but our conversation went deeper.

He told me that when he observed the Korean guy who had been with us earlier, he noticed something: a kind of lack of confidence. Then he asked me if this was common among young people in Asia.

item.title: Essential Australian Setup: Tax Number, Banking & Telecom Guide
item.description:
The Big Three: What You Need to Get Sorted ASAP

Moving to Australia? Here are the three essential services you’ll need to set up as soon as you arrive. Trust me, these will make your life so much easier from day one.

The Reality Check: Everyone says “you can only apply after arriving in Australia,” but here’s the real deal‚Äîyou can actually apply once you have your accommodation sorted.
